name: The Sorcerer's Tail
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys : Move

Spacebar : Attack

Explore through empty ruins invaded by monsters searching for a mysterious wizard.

Made during the Mini Jam 98 : Empty with the limitations "Roguelikes"

Credits:
Akashic Owl - Music, SFX

Caganlıi Sandiwic - Art, Design

Fledered - Code, Design

How To Game Dev - Game Art, Design
